week.theme: Three in a Row - Let's Keep the Winning Streak Alive!

highlights: Great energy and focus from the squad

training.notes: Great training sessions Wed & Thu preparing for Friday's HOME match! Let's make it FOUR wins!

match.preparation_focus: Four wins in a row! Keep the momentum, stay clinical, dominate at home

achievements: Third Win of the Season!
High Five! (5 goals in a match)
Shared Glory (4 different scorers)
Corner Kick Magic (Travis scored direct from corner)
Super Save (both goalkeepers)
Clean Hands (Rhodri 1st half)
previous_match.match_report: THIRD WIN OF THE SEASON! Dominant 5-2 victory away at Eagle Ridge Park. The team was firing from the start with confidence and momentum. Travis C scored TWICE including a stunning direct corner kick goal and a beautiful finish from a difficult angle. Rafael H had his BEST MATCH of the season scoring his FIRST GOAL. Ethan G netted an insane shot, and Andy E added a solid finish. Rhodri W kept a clean sheet in the first half as goalkeeper, while Adam K made many crucial saves in the second half. Impressive defensive display from Yejun K, Andrew N, and Rhodri W. Niko D and Rafael H controlled midfield possession brilliantly. Minh-An D, Owen H, and David C all had excellent performances, with David nearly scoring with beautiful shots. Building incredible winning momentum!

captains.duties: Lead warm-ups ‚Ä¢ Take set pieces ‚Ä¢ Guide positions ‚Ä¢ Motivate teammates

goalkeepers.duties: One GK in goal per 30-minute half ‚Ä¢ Non-GK plays field ‚Ä¢ Switch at half-time
goalkeepers.rotation_note: Andy E second turn (first was Oct 4), David C second turn (first was Sept 27). Eunjun K next in rotation.

sideline_layout.keeper_spot: Near coach for quick switch at half

notes.arrival: Arrive by 9:45 AM (30 min early for warm-up)
notes.kit: Home kit - Blue and White hoops
notes.coach: THREE WINS IN A ROW! Amazing 5-2 victory at Eagle Ridge last Saturday! Travis C scored TWICE including a stunning corner kick goal, Rafael H got his FIRST GOAL, Ethan G with an insane shot, and Andy E added another. Rhodri W kept a clean sheet as first-half goalkeeper, Adam K made crucial saves in the second half. Dominant performance from Yejun K, Andrew N, Rhodri W on defense. Great training this week - Wed at Town Centre Park & Thu at Riverview Park Elementary. Friday Nov 29 at 10:15am vs RMSC U11B6D3 (Geary) at Miller Park West (HOME). Andy E and David C are our goalkeepers. Starting lineup: Yejun & Rhodri defence, Niko/Adam/Rafael midfield, David & Owen strikers. Andrew, Henry, and Minh-An unavailable. Travis, Ethan, and Eunjun rotating. LET'S MAKE IT FOUR WINS!
notes.training_recap: Nov 27-28: Two excellent training sessions - Wed at Town Centre Park, Thu at Riverview Park Elementary - focused on match preparation, technical skills, and tactical review. Great attendance and energy!
notes.match_update: NEXT MATCH: Friday Nov 29 at 10:15am vs RMSC U11B6D3 (Geary), Miller Park West (HOME). Arrive by 9:45 AM.
notes.this_week: Two solid training sessions completed! Team ready for HOME match Friday. FOUR WINS IN A ROW within reach!
